Uses of Class
io.netty.channel.uring.IoUringBufferRingConfig.Builder

  • Packages that use IoUringBufferRingConfig.Builder 
    Package Description
    io.netty.channel.uring
    io_uring is a high I/O performance scalable interface for fully asynchronous Linux syscalls.

    • Uses of IoUringBufferRingConfig.Builder in io.netty.channel.uring

      Methods in io.netty.channel.uring that return IoUringBufferRingConfig.Builder 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      IoUringBufferRingConfig.Builder IoUringBufferRingConfig.Builder.allocator​(IoUringBufferRingAllocator allocator)
      Set the IoUringBufferRingAllocator to use to allocate ByteBufs.
      IoUringBufferRingConfig.Builder IoUringBufferRingConfig.Builder.batchAllocation​(boolean batchAllocation)
      Set allocation strategy that is used to allocate ByteBufs.
      IoUringBufferRingConfig.Builder IoUringBufferRingConfig.Builder.batchSize​(int batchSize)
      Set the size of the batch on how many buffers are added everytime we need to expand the buffer ring.
      IoUringBufferRingConfig.Builder IoUringBufferRingConfig.Builder.bufferGroupId​(short bgId)
      Set the buffer group id to use.
      IoUringBufferRingConfig.Builder IoUringBufferRingConfig.Builder.bufferRingSize​(short bufferRingSize)
      Set the size of the ring.
      static IoUringBufferRingConfig.Builder IoUringBufferRingConfig.builder()  
      IoUringBufferRingConfig.Builder IoUringBufferRingConfig.Builder.incremental​(boolean incremental)
      Set if incremental mode should be used for the buffer ring.
